name: RC
text: HORRIBLE AND UNPROFESSIONAL! I contacted this company back in october about a job. I initially met with mimi diamond who assured me the job was, simple and would be a breeze to handle. She never got with me and when I contacted her she claimed to never have gotten the info. I resent everything and she assured me I would receive proofs soon. Once again she never got back with me and stopped responding to my emails. after over two months went by I finally got her on the phone and she then changed her story to tell me they couldn't do the job. When i asked her why she didn't inform me of this when we first spoke she just got loud and kept repeating the phrase "there's nothing we ca do". When she finally stopped I informed her that we could scrap the original design and go with something plain and simple, she once again started to repeat "there's nothing we can do" and then hung up in my face. I immediately called back and spoke with the owner mark travis. He was apologetic and assured me that this is not how they handle business. He gave me his email and asked me to send over everything; just like mimi he pointed out it was a high end job but they could do it and either him or his business partner pat would reach out to me. Once again I got no call back or follow up email. I called him for weeks and emailed him with no reply, it wasn't until I called from a different phone that he magically picked p the phone. Once again he assured me it would be handled and once again he disappeared and left me hanging. At this point I kept calling and of course he didn't call me back for a while. When I finally got hi on the phone he basically told me he knows his employee and that she wouldn't dare "get out character" basically implying it was something I must have done. He then proceeded to give me the numbers of other print shops because they didn't want to do my job for me. He went on to say they they are blessed and doing well and have the right to pick and choose what jobs they take on or deny. I did nothing wrong and my time was wasted for months dealing with them. Instead of giving a fake apology it would've been nice had he corrected his employee but instead I was thrown to the side and ultimately asked "why do I need to understand why they don't want to take my job". I have never been treated so terribly in my life by a company. If you want a professional place that will do what they promise look elsewhere.

resp.text:
Hi RC, We would like to apologize for your negative experience. We're sorry to hear you were less than satisfied with our service.

We pride ourselves on the high-quality standards we maintain. If you give us a chance, we intend to make this right and hope you will allow us to speak with you to discuss the situation.

Please give us a call at 251-473-4643 at your earliest convenience.

text:
The staff at Fast Sign, specifically Wyndi Avery and Milton awesome!!!  They provide customer service that goes beyond exceptional and they assist you in building a brand for your business.  I went to see them for a design logo for my new medical practice having no clue what I wanted.  They worked intimately with me on the details and they then drafted various logos for my liking at a very reasonable cost.  They provided guidance and made recommendations on what type of signage would be noticeable without going over my budget.   Even when I pointed out mistakes or issues they corrected them with no arguing or hassle.
They have a genuine concern for their clients and their circumstances which I have witnessed on various occasions.  This is a character and quality rarely demonstrated in any profession today but it is a standard of their business and I commend them for their excellent customer service.  If you are looking to brand your business or to build your next signage for your business and if you want the best in customer service then go see Fast Sign and you will never regret it!

After learning from other printing businesses and a good friend that Colonial Printing was the only business able to take on my perfect bound print job, I didn't know what to expect.  Aside from the perfect bound requirement, I had other formatting specifics outlined by the   U.S. Supreme Court that had to be met.  On top of that, I had a short period of time to have my print job in hand to deliver to the U.S
Supreme Court.  Not only did Colonial Printing get the job done right the first time, they also managed their competing print jobs well enough to get mine completed in a couple of days.  Although the U.S. Supreme Court case didn't turn out as expected, I will continue to look to Colonial Printing for print job in the future and will gladly recommend their services to others.

text:
The Office of Marketing & Public Relations at University of Mobile use FastSigns exclusively, because they are true to their name – we get quality signs very fast! The team at FastSigns, especially Pauline, is incredible to work with, throughout the entire process. Their customer service is excellent and some of the best I have ever worked with! Pauline is very personable and approachable, and always works to get us the best pricing on quality products. She goes the extra mile to get to know our projects in order to make our sometimes extravagant visions come to life. She is always able to be reached by phone or email, and responds quickly with estimates. Her staff has adopted this mindset as well, as they ensure that everything from the installations to the billing process is as smooth as possible.

Frank, one of the installers, is the best in the business! He works long hours and always does our installations. We look forward to seeing him on campus, because we know that if Frank is here, it will be done right! We can always count on him to be professional and do a great job.

Outside of University of Mobile, I have used FastSigns for several personal projects and every time they excel and meet my demands! No matter the project, Pauline & her staff are the only name we trust in the sign business to take on our signage requests. They can just about do it all! It’s always a pleasure to work with them!

I figured Fastsigns would be the place to go since they specialize in that type of work. I was assured that the posters would be of high quality and on time. However, when I came in to pick up my posters, they weren’t even ready and were horribly distorted. I was very perturbed to find this out seeing as how I was spending over $300.00 on these posters. Pauline, who was in charge, wouldn’t even personally confront me about this issue, she had one of her employees who was more helpful than Pauline was, bare the grunt. Pauline was also unprofessional as I saw her talk down to one of her employees and treated her poorly right in front of me! text: They are great when you have a big Company name behind you, but if you are a small business owner, the service was very slow. No follow ups I had to follow up three times plus it finally took three weeks to get my order. Johnathon is not what he is cranked up to be either.

resp.text:
Wow, I am very sorry that you had a bad experience with Minuteman Press and especially with me.  I am not aware of this situation.  Please contact me at your convenience so that I may be able to resolve the issues and hopefully provide a solution that will help.
Jonathan
